snippet.title: Angel Blade (PS1) — Playthrough (エンジェル・ブレード)
snippet.description:
Angel Blade Neo Tokyo Guardians Gameplay | エンジェル・ブレード プレイ動画 
Developer: Nippon Ichi Software
Genre: Tactics
Released: 1997
Platform: PlayStation

Description:
A humorous tactical RPG that parodies tokusatsu and anime. The battle system and balance is utterly flawed, yet the game can be weirdly entertaining if you don't expect much from it.

Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzxHKbKxYksjXdbb7fh0sgFmcsFUVAZQG
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Game_Curiosity
